remarks: A transitivity law for colinearity.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 27-Nov-2019.)
statement:
tglineintmo.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
tglineintmo.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
tglineintmo.l $e |- L = ( LineG ` G ) $.
tglineintmo.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) $.
coltr.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. P ) $.
coltr.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. P ) $.
coltr.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. P ) $.
coltr.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. P ) $.
coltr.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. ( B L C ) ) $.
coltr.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( B e. ( C L D ) \/ C = D ) ) $.
coltr $p |- ( ph -> ( A e. ( C L D ) \/ C = D ) ) $.
